Every festival is different and we prepare different delicious dishes they can be made with Rice, snacks or any dessert with milk and sugar. One of the biggest festival in India is Diwali, where you can see their happiness and joy like blowing lights. Each and every person light up their houses and shops with designs to welcome Wealth, happiness and Goddess Lakshmi. And most important on this festival are fireworks, sweets and snacks. Some of the desserts and snacks which I prepared on festival checkout the links below. Today, I prepared a special dessert/ sweet which has less ingredients and more delicious ğŸ˜‹ Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: Milk - 2 litres Sugar - 235 gms Pistachios - Finely chopped - 2 tb sp Badam / Almonds - 60 gms - cut into half Ghee - 1 tb sp Procedure:
  • Heat deep pan on medium heat
  • Add milk
  • Boil milk
  • Stir occasionally till milk reduces half
  • Add sugar & mix well
  • Stir continuously, Add ghee
  • Cook till the consistency becomes thick and non sticky
  • Transfer it on a tray
  • Let it become cool
  • Serve it to your family members ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜€
